Frequently asked questions¶

How will this improve?¶

As it is the first version, we are planning on developing a lot of features in the future, as well as improving some behaviours.
While the application is functional at this moment, we are expecting feedback and improvement ideas from people who use this app.
For the next release, we’ll be completing some features like:

  • search
  • date-time filtering
  • results ordering

which are now either missing or buggy.

Is it free?¶

Yes, you can use OutSourcer API absolutely free of charge.

Is it open-source?¶

Yes, OutSourcer is open-source and it is distributed under BSD License.

What’s it written in?¶

OutSourcer is written in Python, using Django and Django Rest Framework.
For the data-storage it uses PostgreSQL and Redis.

I need to change code¶

If your project needs something different than the default functionality (and it almost surely will), feel free to adapt the code to fit your needs.
Anyway, in order to make this easier for you, make sure you are comfortable with Django Rest Framework.
